strings.string: If not empty, the value of this textbox will be used by the remap manager to filter the table below. Only original URLs containing the value will be returned.
If not empty, the value of this textbox will be used by the remap manager to filter the table below. Only remapped URLs containing the value will be returned.
Automatically add remaps when webpath changed?
This option defines the default behaviour when altering the Web Paths of an asset. This can be overridden on an asset-by-asset basis when changing Web Paths.
